entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
